statements: UPDATE ethics_approval SET approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ethics_approval SET researcher_name = 'Alice Smith', research_description = 'New research study' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ethics_approval SET approval_status = 'Approved', submission_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ethics_approval SET research_description = 'Updated research description', researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE approval_status = 'Pending';
UPDATE research_projects SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', approval_status = TRUE WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE approval_logs SET comments = 'Approved by Admin', approval_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', researcher_name = 'New Researcher Name' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE approval_logs SET approval_date = '2022-09-30', comments = 'Approval granted on time' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'Project X', approval_status = TRUE WHERE project_id = 123;
UPDATE researchers SET position = 'Lead Researcher', department = 'Science' WHERE researcher_id = 456;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated Project Description', approval_status = true WHERE project_id = 101;
UPDATE researchers SET position = 'Lead Researcher', department = 'Science', researcher_email = 'updatedemail@example.com' WHERE researcher_id = 201;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', researcher_id = 2, approval_date = '2022-10-10' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE subjects SET subject_name = 'Updated Subject Name', subject_age = 30 WHERE subject_id = 3;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', approval_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET researcher_email = 'newemail@example.com', institution = 'New Institution' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_title = 'Updated Project Title', researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE project_id = 5;
UPDATE research_subjects SET subject_age = 35, subject_gender = 'Female' WHERE subject_id = 10;
UPDATE research_projects SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE project_id = 12345;
UPDATE research_subjects SET subject_age = 30, subject_gender = 'Male' WHERE project_id = 12345 AND subject_id = 67890;
